title: Bodoni ?
content: I attached a logo that I have been asked to work with for an assignment. I was told that the two fonts used within this logo are Bliss and Bodoni. I am looking for confirmation on the Bodoni portion of the logo, as I am not confidant that it actually is Bodoni.
author: cesca

comments.content: Sure looks like Bodoni Std from Adobe to me - the two others I have are BT and URW and they are not it.
